name: The Nine Tales
description:
Play as a wild fox on its path to achieving immortality.

The Nine Tales is a Visual Novel and Platforming game that follows the story of a young and naïve fox who will be granted immortal life on the condition that it learns to understand the human heart.

Earn 9 tails, with each tail (level) corresponding to a stage of human grief, as the feral fox must understand mortality in order to challenge it.

Note: This is a demo. There are not 9 levels in this game.

Genre: 2D Narrative, Platformer
Platform: PC
Player Count: 1
Supported Controls: Keyboard & Controller
